2016-0506 (La. 5/2/16)

STATE of Louisiana v. Germany G. SMITH, Johnny Ray Robinson And Johnathan T. Robinson NO. 2016-KK-0506 Supreme Court of Louisiana. May 2, 2016

Applying For Supervisory and/or Remedial Writs, Parish of Caddo, 1st Judicial District Court Div. 5, No. 325,232; to the Court of Appeal, Second Circuit, No. 50,-606-KW;

Denied.

WEIMER, J., would grant.
